alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Morgan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 10:18PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Weld, northeastern Elbert, eastern Arapahoe, western Morgan and eastern Adams Counties through 1115 PM MDT... At 1017 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Roggen to 9 miles north of Ramah, or along a line extending from 23 miles southeast of Greeley to 28 miles west of Limon. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bennett, Keenesburg, Wiggins, Deer Trail, Hoyt, Shamrock, Weldona, Leader, Agate, Twelve-Mile Corner, Jackson Reservoir, Strasburg, Adena School, Orchard, Byers, Adena, Prospect Valley, Cottonwood Valley and Goodrich. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
